attributes.description:
At WINGFIELD MOTORS our customer is king!
Before delivery, this vehicle will receive a Multi-point quality inspection before being subjected to an AA DEKRA roadworthiness test.  We will trade in any vehicle on this transaction and ensure you receive a pleasant buying experience.  Finance and Insurance can be arranged from our premises by our highly qualified and experienced staff.  You can be assured of great aftersales service, should this be required.  This vehicle can be delivered country wide at an agreed cost.  Please ask about our optional Mechanical breakdown warranties for your new vehicle.  We also provide optional Service Plans to ensure you do not experience sudden servicing costs.

attributes.description:
The Ford Ecoboost is an SUV with many storage places and seat positions ensuring to fulfill your every need.  The passive and active safety features are top class!
Rear park assist, Cruise control, traction control, auto lights, multi-function steering wheel, 
Air conditioner, Electric Windows, Radio, AUX, Bluetooth, Sync 1 Voice Control, 
6 Air Bags, Side Impact Protection, 
Central Locking, On Board Computer, Leather interior, 
Security System, Immobiliser, Power Steering, Impact Tensioning Seat Belts, Brakes, ABS, EBD
Hi Level Brake Light, 
Body Coloured Bumpers, 
Body Coloured Mirrors 
Come in today and test drive this car, IT IS FOR YOU! Don’t delay we will evaluate your existing vehicle for FREE. We will not short change you. Visit our website to see our full range of stock. A 1% of the value of the vehicle non refundable deposit, secures the vehicle for two days. If that deposit lapses, You would be required to put another nonrefundable deposit to secure it further.. Please be aware of scams with fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay any deposits unless you deal and pay deposits directly into Primo Executive Cars bank account!
